DOC.brief_summary: Create database select medical information infant bear hypoxic-ischemic encephalopathy ( HIE ) . In addition , follow sample collect bio-repository future study : blood , urine , buccal sample .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study create detail medical sample database infant bear HIE . Both medical information sample de-identified . Any future study perform data sample receive Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) approval .
DOC.criteria: Gestational Age great equal 35 week gestation Birth weight great equal 1.8 kg Less equal 6 hour since insult occur Severe hypoxicischemic encepholopathy ( HIE ) Presence lethal chromosomal abnormality Severe IUGR Significant intracranial hemorrhage large intracranial hemorrhage ( Grade III intraparenchymal echodensity ( Grade IV ) )
